thread.section_title: Kiwi Drug Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Kiwi Drug | kiwidrug.com
thread.title: Curious Bear101
thread.title_full: Kiwi Drug reviewed by Curious Bear101

author: Curious Bear101
title: Curious Bear101
text:
5 of 5 Stars!! One of the most important concerns I have when ordering products from a company located overseas (I live in America) is that there will be people to contact regarding inquiries and that the response time is within 48 to 72 hours. You can imagine my surprise and delight when my inquiries were handled within hours of posting!
Thus, I can verify that this company not only offers products with excellent prices it also has superlative customer service. The projected delivery dates for products are spot on and all come with tracking numbers.
I am very happy with this company.
